ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Mage Focus Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... yes, too true! now i remember that i had to go back again to Najena, just to collect those pages. i was so ignorant about the epic, that i threw away the
ygData.messageBody:
> ...
> Najina its worthwhile picking up the pages for your epic as well.
> ...

yes, too true! now i remember that i had to go back again to Najena,
just to collect those pages. i was so ignorant about the epic, that i
threw away the pages, when i did the focus items. very stupid move.


> My next question is, are the items No-Drop or can anyone get them?

i didn't check allakhazam (and i don't remember), but i believe, some
parts are NO DROP. the focus item's are NO DROP for sure (some of
them are also needed for epic).


besides, last saturday i have been to drake isle in sky for the first
time. i was guest of another guild's raid, and they made it there for
the first time. even only their mage got a crown (and i am really
happy for him) it was quite an experience: after i couldn't see spirocs anymore, we finally hit the bees, well, all went good until
the boss whiped out the whole raid, but we were prepared, so after
recovering from this it was almost easy ... :)

after 2 years working for the epic, i lost the faith in getting it. or, well, it isn't my motivation for EQ anymore. if i should get the
last 3 missing pieces (water staff, earth staff, sky crown), i would
be very happy ... but i don't count on it.


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, level 56 female gnome magician
Urva Ceindrech, level 51 female dark-elf wizard
Delaney Arianwen, level 51 female high-elf cleric
Latrodectus Mactans - Tarew Marr
